questions.question: I show up with a smile when you feel good inside.
I make you shiver and wear a jacket.
I purr, chase mice, and love to nap in the sun.
I'm faster than walking; you do me in races.
I light up the day and keep the Earth warm.
I'm a color, like the sky or the ocean.
I'm round and fun to kick, throw, or bounce.
I go up off the ground with both feet.
You do this with food, three times a day.
You sit on me to rest your legs. I have four legs.
I have pages and words — you read me for fun or facts.
I'm white, cold, and come from cows.
I have roots, a trunk, and leaves — I give shade.
I curve your lips upward when you're happy.
I face danger without fear — like a firefighter or hero.
I show care and help others feel good.
I come with joy, often with a big sound.
You do this to a ball or falling object with your hands.
You do this with blocks or bricks to make something tall.
You do this with soap and water to get clean.
I'm clear and wet, you drink me every day.
I have rhythm and melody, you listen to me.
I happen when you sleep, sometimes wild and strange.
I'm white and fluffy, floating in the sky.
I help you see in the dark, I brighten your day.
I'm the color of grass and leaves on trees.
I taste good, like candy or honey.
I'm calm and quiet, no fighting or noise.
I make impossible things happen, like tricks.
I'm vast and blue, full of fish and waves.
I bloom in gardens, colorful and pretty.
I'm a season when flowers bloom and birds sing.
I bring rain, wind, and thunder from the sky.
I cross over water, connecting two sides.
I'm white and cold, covering the ground in winter.
I'm dark and follow you when the sun shines.
I'm the loud sound you hear during a storm.
I'm worn on a king or queen's head.
I'm a color, like grapes or violets.
I'm a shiny metal, valuable and bright.
I cast spells and wear a pointy hat.
I'm a big stone building where kings live.
I'm a mythical creature that breathes fire.
I'm a brave warrior who fights for honor.
I rule a kingdom, wearing a crown.
I'm a long sharp weapon used in battle.
I protect you in battle, round and strong.
I'm valuable gold and jewels hidden away.
I'm a royal son, future king.
I'm precious gems, diamonds and rubies.
I'm a long journey across the sea or space.
I'm deep knowledge gained from experience.
I'm bravery in the face of danger or fear.
I'm your inner energy and determination.
I'm respect and integrity, doing what's right.
I'm a famous story passed down through time.
I'm brave people who save others and do great deeds.
I'm something hidden, known only to a few.
I'm an amazing event that seems impossible.
I'm amazement and awe at something beautiful.
I'm something puzzling and hard to understand.
I'm strength and ability to control or influence.
I'm your future path, what you're meant to become.
I'm the winner, the one who succeeds in battle.
I'm great honor and fame from achievements.
I'm the time that is yet to come.
I'm holy and worthy of great respect.
I'm lasting forever, without end.
I'm a mythical bird that rises from ashes.
I'm what you leave behind, your lasting impact.
I'm royal headpieces worn by kings and queens.
I'm a prize won in victory or competition.
I'm tiny flashes of light, like from fire or stars.
I'm the bright, hot part of fire.
I'm violent weather with wind, rain, and thunder.
I'm the royal seat where a king or queen sits.
I'm members of a royal family, kings and queens.
I'm kingdoms or domains ruled by a monarch.
I'm a flag carried in battle or celebration.
I'm winners, the best in competitions.
I'm protectors who watch and defend.
I'm explorers who go ahead to find the way.
I'm groups of soldiers or team members.
I'm protective metal suits worn in battle.
I'm sharp cutting weapons, like swords.
I'm projectiles shot from a bow.
I'm long pointed weapons used for thrusting.
I'm curved weapons used to shoot arrows.
I'm chopping tools with sharp blades.
I'm mysterious powers that create wonders.
I'm powerful giants from ancient mythology.
I'm divine beings with supreme power.
I'm goddesses, female divine beings.
I'm a wise prophet who sees the future.
I'm magical words that create effects.
I'm harmful magic that brings bad luck.
I'm ancient magical symbols with power.
I'm sacred tables used for offerings.
I'm holy places of worship and prayer.
I'm valuable hidden wealth, gold and gems.
